content: And seek in her open places
If you can find a man,
If there is  who executes judgment,
Therefore thus says the  God of hosts:
“Nevertheless in those days,” says the , “I will not make a complete end of you.

And it will be when you say, ‘Why does the  our God do all these  to us?’ then you shall answer them, ‘Just as you have forsaken Me and served foreign gods in your land, so you shall serve aliens in a land  not yours.’
